where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aga <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'APPLIED_GROUP_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PARAMETER_TYPE' IN TYPEOF ( aga . assigned_group ) ) AND ( aga . assigned_group \ group . name IN [ 'string property type' , 'logical property type' , 'physical property type' , 'boolean property type' ] ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - ( TYPEOF ( SELF \ representation || SELF \ representation_relationship || SELF \ parameter_assignment_override ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF \ representation_relationship . rep_1 <> SELF \ representation_relationship . rep_2

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( it ) * [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'MODEL_PARAMETER' ] ) = 1 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( it ) * [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'COORDINATED_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' ] ) = 1 ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aga <* USEDIN ( it , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'APPLIED_GROUP_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | ( SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( aga \ group_assignment . assigned_group ) * [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'CHARACTERISTIC_TYPE' ] ) = 1 ) ) ) = 1 ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - TYPEOF ( SELF \ representation || SELF \ parameter_assignment_representation ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'assigned parameter' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PARAMETER_ASSIGNMENT_REPRESENTATION' ] * TYPEOF ( pdr . used_representation ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SELF \ characterized_object . name = SELF \ product_category . name
